name: ebus-notebook
description: Notebook for eBUS activities using ebus-typespec and an optional ebusd instance.

commands.title: Create New eBUS TypeSpec file from Template
Convert eBUS TypeSpec to ebusd CSV
Convert eBUS TypeSpec and test on ebusd
Toggle query for user input on upload CSV to ebusd

ebus-notebook.conversion.show.title: Conversion Visibility
ebus-notebook.conversion.show.description: Whether to show the conversion process terminal or use a task instead of a terminal.

ebus-notebook.conversion.cmd.title: Conversion Command
ebus-notebook.conversion.cmd.markdownDescription: The command to use for converting [TypeSpec to ebusd CSV](https://github.com/john30/ebus-typespec).

ebus-notebook.ebusd.host.title: ebusd REPL Host
ebus-notebook.ebusd.host.markdownDescription: The host name or IP address of [ebusd REPL](https://github.com/john30/ebusd/wiki/3.1.-TCP-client-commands) to connect to.

ebus-notebook.ebusd.port.title: ebusd REPL Port
ebus-notebook.ebusd.port.markdownDescription: The port number of [ebusd REPL](https://github.com/john30/ebusd/wiki/3.1.-TCP-client-commands) to connecto to..

ebus-notebook.ebusd.read.title: ebusd read Command
ebus-notebook.ebusd.read.markdownDescription: The command to use for issuing a read of a generated definition. User input is asked for when convert+test command is issued with '-i' as first argument. See [read command](https://github.com/john30/ebusd/wiki/3.1.-TCP-client-commands#read).

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run package-vsix
